name: Assault (itch)
description:
Hey!, I am a beginner indie game developer. Assault is my first game as a game developer. It was made on godot game engine. I took inspiration from classic NES battle tanks as I wanted to create something simple but fun as my first game.

Assault is currently only available on android. Please do comment about your views on game. if you notice any bugs, report in comments.

Thank-you for downloading.
